website_summaries.verdict: Spray this sleep aid on your pillow to inhale calming essential oils to help you sleep.
pros: Contains soothing oils like lavender and chamomile
Just spray on your pillow and breathe in the fragrance to settle you down for sleep
cons: Does not contain any actual sleep agents, but rather fragrances many people find soothing and relaxing

I spray it on the underside of my pillow and my husband's and it definitely helps you relax. When you use this in combination with the Calm App, especially the sleep stories, you will drift right off to sleep.
